name: Hawaii medical education special fund
text:
There is established a Hawaii medical education special fund, into which shall be deposited all funds received by the medical education council, including:
     (1)  Moneys from the federal Centers for Medicaid and Medicare Services or other federal agencies;
     (2)  State appropriations; and
     (3)  Grants, contracts, donations, or private contributions.
The fund shall be administered by the university.  Moneys deposited in the fund shall be expended by the university for the purposes of the graduate medical education program established under section [304A-1702]. [L 2006, c 75, pt of §2]
